name: project-2-types
description: Shared types between frontend and backend

scripts.build: tsc -p . && esbuild 'lib/ajv/*.js' --minify --outdir=dist/ajv && esbuild 'lib/interface/*.js' --minify --outdir=dist/interface && cp lib/index.* dist && cp lib/ajv/*.d.ts dist/ajv && cp lib/interface/*.d.ts dist/interface
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm publish --access public

author: Voyagers
